turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order 3 large pizzas from Domino's Pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, there are 3 Domino's Pizza locations that deliver near you. Which one would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one that is on the same street as me *gives street name*

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will begin to place the order for the Domino's Pizza on *Street name*. May I proceed

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes you may

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of pizzas would you like to order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 3 large hand-tossed pizzas. One that is all cheese, one pepperoni, and one sausage. I am having a friend get together

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so I have 3 large pizzas one all cheese, one pepperoni, and one sausage. Is this correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it is

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else that you would like to add to your order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like a side order of breadsticks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I added a side order of breadsticks to your 3 large pizza selection. Anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is all

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so the total comes out to $25.09. Would you like to to place this order for pick-up or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will pick it up

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I placed the order for 6:05 so the pizza will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thank you very much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can help you with today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! If you need to contact Domino's Pizza about your pick-up, here is their number: *gives phone number+
